name: Zomber (itch)
description:
Zomber is a tough as nails wave based side scrolling 2D shoot em up. You will be constantly on the brink of death searching for ammo and health fighting back hordes of the undead through 7 levels full of unique zombies hellbent on ending your life. Can you survive the peril of Zomber?

Arrow keys to move,  Z - jump,  X - shoot,  C - swap weapons,  SHIFT - slide,  A - use heal
